alert.note: Alert for Lassen-Eastern Plumas-Eastern Sierra Counties (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 26 at 2:03PM PDT until March 28 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM MONDAY TO 11 PM PDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches, except 10 to 20 inches west of highway 395. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Lassen-Eastern Plumas-Eastern Sierra Counties. * WHEN...From 11 PM Monday to 11 PM PDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult if not impossible. Gusty winds may create whiteout conditions at times and produce considerable drifting of snow.
info.instruction: Avoid travel if possible, you could be stuck in your vehicle for many hours. If you must travel, prepare for long delays and carry an emergency kit with extra food, water and clothing. If you stay home, have a backup plan in case of power outages. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
